meanings.definition: The act or process of interstratifying.
meanings.sent1: The interstratifications of the soil layers were clearly visible in the excavation site.
meanings.sent2: The geologist studied the interstratifications of the rock formations to understand their history.
meanings.sent3: The interstratifications of the cake layers made it look like a delicious geological formation.
meanings.sent4: The interstratifications of colors in the painting created a mesmerizing effect.
meanings.sent5: The interstratifications of the puzzle pieces made it challenging to solve.

meanings.sent1: The interstratifications of the different materials resulted in a unique pattern.
meanings.sent2: The interstratifications of the sediments indicated a complex history of the area.
meanings.sent3: The interstratifications of the books on the shelf made them look like a literary staircase.
meanings.sent4: The interstratifications of emotions in her voice revealed a hidden depth.
meanings.sent5: The interstratifications of flavors in the dish created a harmonious blend.
